availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Sanford J. McGlone (Carter County, Kentucky, farm hand.)

body.p: Carter County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Sone of James McGlone and Elizabeth Stone McGlone. Resident of Carter County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmhand in Carter County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carter County, District No 2, p. 230A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carter County, p. 158.
Robert E. McGlone and Thomas H. McGlone, The McGlones: A Series on the McGlone Name as Researched in the United States, (McGlone and Associates, 1980), pp. 65-66.
"Sanford Jackson McGlone (1840-1908)," Find A Grave, Memorial 92560651, Accessed June 28, 2022, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/92560651.
